lines.text: We'll have school together.
School?
Oh yes, you must learn how to read, everyone does.

[to her grandfather]
You can't just turn your back like that! You can't!
[Heidi can finally hear the lady of the mountain]
I can hear her Peter, the lady of the mountain I can finally hear her.
And I was so looking forward to having a friend, please don't go, please stay!
[Klara panics when Heidi talks about going back to the mountains]
No Heidi! This is your home now! You can't talk about leaving, do you hear me you mustn't!
[Heidi sees her grandfather after a long time]
Grandfather it's me Heidi. You didn't forget me did you?
[Heidi's grandfather says nothing and walks out to the barn]
Klara I made a promise to Grandmother before she died. I didn't even know what it meant. Not then, but now I do. This is my home Klara, this is where I belong.
[Heidi's grandfather just reads a letter about Heidi from Herr Sesemann]
You think you can just drop her into my life then take her away again? I won't allow it! She can't stay here.
She's got to, she's your granddaughter.
NO! I don't have a granddaughter, not anymore.
Well you can't do this, what am I supposed to tell Herr Sesemann?
Tell him that this is not a boarding house and tell him to keep his stinking money!
[Heidi's grandfather throws the money into the fire]
Oh my God! What are you doing? You fool! You stupid old fool!
[Dete gets the money out of the fire]

[to Dete]
Get out of here! Out of my life! Forever.

[to Heidi]
Adelheid, what's wrong, what's the matter with you? Are you trying to wake up the whole household?
She's dying! She's dying!
Heidi! But, I thought you were going...

[kisses Peter's cheek]
Go to school, Peter! Now!
I will.
